name: LD46 - Fire Saver
description:
Controls : 

Player 1 : WASD to move - Space to attack

Player 2 : Arrow to move - NUMPAD0 / RCTRL to attack

Goal : 

Survive as long as you can in solo, survive longer than your friend in multi

Destroying a grown tree give logs, big trees drop seeds over time. 

Hit interactable object to throw them away.

Enemy act as water when thrown or hitting other object

Water + seed = new tree

Water + fire = weaker fire

Water + tree = bigger tree

Log + Fire = Stronger fire
